Once again notes, sorry 

Well, please see in description the run time is 1hour and 45 mnts. Why? Becoz of the following work done:

1. Source have low FPS and ghosting issue. 

2. For my rip, I tried to increase the FPS to 23.976, 24, 25 .... till 60 FPS to bring the movie to that smoothness, which looks good to our eyes but it did not worked on any of the FPS. 

3. Then, I used a trick... Trick is, I have fast forwarded the movie by reproducing the source in 25fps and speeding up the movie to 0.20%, which decreased the time. BUT the movie is complete. 

4. It is same like, when u fast forward the movie with your remote, the 2 hours movie can finish in 1 hour. The run time decreases. 

5. By doing above, I cannot get 100% perfectness, but still I have done this to give you something to watch, better than the source. 

Now question rises, if I have speedup the movie, then how we can watch a speedy movie... Well, no issues, not a single point you will feel something like that bcoz I have managed it properly. 

I value your bandwidth and I don't want to waste your time. Trust me, check samples carefully again and again to feel the difference and then download my rip.

Again, this is not 100% fixed rip. I did this for you bcoz there is no new source coming. Hope u wud like it. Thanks!
